name: ALONE?
description: Explore and experience this horror story, as you embark on an ghostly adventure unlike anything you have played before. Come face-to-face with terror itself as you look for your missing sister.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core2 Quad Q8400 Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 1GB / Radeon R7 250X 1GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space

reviews.review_text: This is no where near a horror game. The entire game is 'wander around and open up doors'. You will slowly unravel a story in which is not even horror at all. The horror is the game itself on how bad it is ! 3 bucks for this?? This should be free or 50cents
